Class HybridList<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • HybridList<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - will be the type of the objects that will be contained inside this class.

    public class HybridList<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A hybrid container class that has a LinkedList inside and will store KWArrayLists.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HybridList()
      Constructor that creates an empty list.

      • get

        public E get(int listIndex,
    int arrayIndex)
        Parameters:
        listIndex - is the index for the arraylist that will be searched.
        arrayIndex - is the index for the element that will be searched in an arraylist.
        Returns:
        the data in listIndex'th ArrayList and arrayIndex'th element of it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if tried to reach an element with invalid index values.

      • get

        public E get(int index)
        Searches the whole linkedList as a whole.
        Parameters:
        index - is the index for the element that will be searched.
        Returns:
        the element that is stored in the given index.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if tried to reach an element with invalid index values.

      • remove

      • remove

        public void remove(int index)
        Removes the element with the given index from the linkedlist.
        Parameters:
        index - is the index of the element that will be removed. Should be smaller than size, bigger than 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if tried to reach an element with invalid index values.

      • remove

        public void remove(int listIndex,
          int arrayIndex)
        Removes an element from the linkedList with the given index values.
        Parameters:
        listIndex - is the index of the arrayList that the element will be removed from.
        arrayIndex - is the index of the element in the arrayList.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if tried to reach an element with invalid index values.
